description: Looking to satisfy your craving for barbecue ribs? Try this slow-cooker barbecue-braised ribs recipe for a mouth-watering dinner everyone will love.
name: Slow-Cooker Barbecue-Braised Ribs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven grill to high. Brush ribs with a little sauce, then grill for 5 minutes or until caramelised and sticky. Serve ribs with coleslaw and remaining sauce.
